text:
1. Grab the rowing handle.
2. Sit on the rowing machine seat.
3. Place feet on the footrests.
4. Push off with the legs.
5. Lean back slightly.
6. Pull the rowing handle towards the chest.
7. Straighten the arms.
8. Bend the knees and slide forward.
9. Repeat the pulling motion.
10. Continue rowing for desired duration.
